name: Fisherman's Catch
description:
Catch fish. Whack bird.

Fisherman's Catch is a fishing game set on a river. You have to catch jumping fish while protecting your catch from pesky birds. How many fish can you catch?

Controls:

  •  WASD - Move
  •  SPACE - Jump
  • LEFT CLICK - Use selected item
  •  Q - Select Paddle
  • E - Select Fishing Rod

Made in 48 hours for Alakajam #17
